text.section:
In this section, "registration plate cover" means any tinted, colored, painted, marked, clear, or illuminated object that is designed to:
Cover any of the characters of a vehicle's registration plate; or
Distort a recorded image of any of the characters of a vehicle's registration plate recorded by a traffic control signal monitoring system under § 21-202.1 of this article.
A person may not sell or offer for sale a registration plate cover.
A person may not advertise for the purpose of promoting the sale of registration plate covers.
